attributes.action: End the ex Prime Minister annual allowance of £115,000
attributes.additional_details: No other employee is paid a vast sum of money when they leave a job - by choice or force.  MPs bring in cuts to all areas, we have had austerity which affected those who could I’ll afford to have less money, yet they are overly generous with themselves and the Prime Minister.  Considering it is the MPs and Prime Ministers who have driven the country to the appalling state it is in, they should not be paid any sort of allowance.  We are rewarding failure, especially in recent times.  It must stop
attributes.background: Stop paying every ex PM an annual allowance, the sum of £115,000 is unnecessary as they are no longer in position.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/625940
